Patent Information.Abstract: The present invention relates generally to peptides and more specifically to antimicrobial and immunomodulatory host defense peptides.
The present invention relates generally to peptides and more specifically to antimicrobial and immunomodulatory host defense peptides.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19428758] Gram-positive bacteria :Bacillus subtilis(MIC=5 μg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=10 μg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=5 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=10 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=10 μg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=10 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19428758] HC50>800 μg/ml against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Design of novel indolicidin-derived antimicrobial peptides with enhanced cell specificity and potent anti-inflammatory activity
Literature.Author: Yong Hai Nan , Jeong-Kyu Bang , Song Yub Shin
